divs: sighting detailsaround this date i lived in roseville mich. i was traveling south on gratiot ave. when this orange red glowing object passed over the car i said to my 16 year old nephew'theo, tell me you see that too'.he said \or mmore like yelled \'what the f#\!? what is that!?"that event or i mean what i saw is as fresh in my mind as if it only happened yesterday the date and year may not be accurate but the exact spot time and the trajectory of the object are .i would prefer to forget it but i can not.it was between 200 to300 ft in diameter and it was the same color as the sun as it sets in the evening only it was 1030pm then it abruptly hovered and landed and we lost sight of it
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Roseville
There were no other sightings in Roseville on or around December 28th 1984
Summary: glowing red-orange passed overhead north to south then abruptly stopped and decended as if landing
